title: The Swiftbolt Skin Bug
body: So I was testing the new Varus skin and saw the "bug" where his model turns mostly to a red and black color scheme and thought that was actually pretty cool and was hope that maybe you guys would keep that as his passive indicator instead of changing it to just a glow around his bow, and you could make the when he kills a champion indicator Black and White, this is of course if you can figure out what caused the glitch in the first place. Otherwise I would suggest keeping that effect in mind for if you make a Legendary or even Ultimate skin for him because I personally thought that effect was awesome, but yeah that is just my opinion. Now my opinion about the skin set as a whole is they work together quite nicely but is there going to be more "Gravelord" like skins so they have like a "Rival" set of skins? Maybe something like Gold Dragon Shyvanna or maybe "Unholy amalgam Urgot" if you guys are planing on keeping up with the "Lord of the Rings"/"Dungeons and Dragons" Fantasy theme.
